Html:
Hello,

I need to set the Start in (Optional) setting for Windows 7 Task.

Does anyone know how I can perform this task.

Thanks,

When creating an ExecAction, add a value to the WorkingDirectory property.
// In constructor, last param is WorkingDirectory
var action = new ExecAction("cmd.exe", "echo Working...", @"C:\");
// In object, use property
action.WorkingDirectory = @"C:\Windows";
